subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Marco Andretti hit a two-lap average speed of 221.273 miles per hour to take the pole for the first IndyCar Series race at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., since 1989.
snippet: Marco Andretti hit a two-lap average speed of 221.273 miles per hour to take the pole for the first IndyCar Series race at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., since 1989.
